params.name: libvorbisStrategy
params.label: Strategy
params.description: The encoding mode to use. Choose Average Bitrate (ABR), Constant Rate Factor (CRF) Constant Quantizer (CQP) or even Lossless.

subvalues.name: libvorbisStrategyABR
subvalues.label: Average Bitrate [kbit]
subvalues.description: The average data rate allowed by the encoder.

subvalues.name: libvorbisStrategyQP
subvalues.label: Constant Quality
subvalues.description: Set constant quality setting for VBR. The value should be a float number in the range of -1 to 10. The higher the value, the better the quality.
